Package uo.ri.cws.application.service.workorder

Interface WorkOrderCrudService

All Known Implementing Classes:
WorkOrderCrudServiceImpl
public interface WorkOrderCrudService
This service is intended to be used by the Foreman It follows the ISP principle (@see SOLID principles from RC Martin)

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void deleteWorkOrder​(java.lang.String id)
    Removes the work order form the system if it still do not have interventions.

    java.util.List<WorkOrderDto> findWorkOrdersByPlateNumber​(java.lang.String plate)
    Returns a list of work orders registered for the specified plate number

    Updates the description of the work order specified by the id and version fields.

  • Method Details

    • registerNew

      WorkOrderDto registerNew​(WorkOrderDto dto) throws BusinessException
      Registers a new work order out of the data received. Only this fields will be taken into account: - the vehicle id, and - the description of the work to be done The rest of fields will assigned by the service, thus any provided value will be ignored.
      Parameters:
      dto - . Just vehicle id and description.
      Returns:
      another dto with the provided values and service-assigned fields filled: id, date and status
      Throws:
      BusinessException - if: - there is another work order for the same vehicle at the same date and time (timestamp), or - the vehicle does not exist

    • updateWorkOrder

      void updateWorkOrder​(WorkOrderDto dto) throws BusinessException
      Updates the description of the work order specified by the id and version fields. No other field is taken for the update. Only work orders with status of OPEN or ASSIGNED can be updated.
      Parameters:
      dto - , with work order id, version and description.
      Throws:
      BusinessException - if: - there is no work order with that id, or - there work order has not the specified version (optimistic lock), or - the work order is not in the OPEN or ASSIGNED status

    • deleteWorkOrder

      void deleteWorkOrder​(java.lang.String id) throws BusinessException
      Removes the work order form the system if it still do not have interventions.
      Parameters:
      id - , of the work order
      Throws:
      BusinessException - if: - the work order does not exist, or - there already is some intervention registered.

    • findWorkOrderById

      java.util.Optional<WorkOrderDto> findWorkOrderById​(java.lang.String woId) throws BusinessException
      Parameters:
      woId - , id of the work order
      Returns:
      the optional filled if the work order exists
      Throws:
      BusinessException

    • findWorkOrdersByVehicleId

      java.util.List<WorkOrderDto> findWorkOrdersByVehicleId​(java.lang.String id) throws BusinessException
      Returns a list of work orders registered for the specified vehicle id
      Parameters:
      id -
      Returns:
      the list, will be empty if: - the vehicle does not exist, or - it has no work orders registered.
      Throws:
      BusinessException

    • findWorkOrdersByPlateNumber

      java.util.List<WorkOrderDto> findWorkOrdersByPlateNumber​(java.lang.String plate) throws BusinessException
      Returns a list of work orders registered for the specified plate number
      Parameters:
      plate -
      Returns:
      the list, will be empty if: - the vehicle does not exist, or - it has no work orders registered.
      Throws:
      BusinessException
